introduce.title: Why choose
introduce.itemTitle1: Flexible storage solutions - meet different business needs
introduce.itemSubTitle1: Different sellers have different operating models, Cube offers a personalized warehousing solution to ensure that your goods are stored under the most suitable conditions:
introduce.itemDescribe11: •Short-term storage - suitable for quick turnover of goods, flexible delivery, reduce warehousing costs
introduce.itemDescribe12: •Long-term storage - suitable for bulk purchase, seasonal commodity storage, optimize supply chain costs
introduce.itemDescribe13: •Temperature controlled storage - suitable for food, beauty, medical and other products with special requirements for storage environment
introduce.itemTitle2: SKU Inventory Management - Precise control of each item
introduce.itemSubTitle2: Different categories of goods have different requirements for warehousing management, Cube uses a multi-SKU management
introduce.itemDescribe21: •Multi-platform SKU synch - seamlessly connect with Amazon, eBay, Shopify, TikTok and more to automatically update inventory data to avoid oversold or out of stock
introduce.itemDescribe22: •Multi-category inventory classification - for ordinary goods, fragile goods, large goods, temperature control goods, etc., to provide different storage methods to improve management efficiency
introduce.itemDescribe23: •Inventory batch management - Intelligent partition storage based on production date, batch, expiration date, etc., to ensure product quality and turnover
